ComicInfo.Title: The Sabotage Handbook; One Fine Afternoon Next Week; Olympic One-Shots; Head of the Klass Report Cards!; Wishing Well; History of Cracked; Form & Function Looks at Little League Gear!; Robocops and Roborobbers; One Day in the Country; The Uggly Family Go to the Olympics!; Couch Potato Catalogue; One-Shots; Press and Jerk; Radzilla; False Rumors about Cracked; One Evening on the Sleazy Side of Town
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hudd and Dini throws a coin into a wishing well. A woman appears but it's the guard in disguise.
Examining the impact of Cracked on civilization beginning in pre-history.
A giant monster builds a skateboard.
Rumors about Cracked magazine are debunked.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:39:07. [Issue ID 250598]
